sn11.6:1.3: Tasmim kho pana, bhikkhave, sangame asura jinimsu, deva parajinimsu.
sn11.6:1.4: Parajita ca kho, bhikkhave, deva apayamsveva uttarenamukha, abhiyamsveva ne asura.
sn11.6:1.5: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo matali sangahakam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn11.6:3.1: ‘Evam, bhaddantava’ti kho, bhikkhave, matali sangahako sakkassa devanamindassa patissutva sahassayuttam ajannaratham paccudavattesi.
sn11.6:3.3: ‘paccudavatto kho dani sakkassa devanamindassa sahassayutto ajannaratho.
sn11.6:3.4: Dutiyampi kho deva asurehi sangamessanti’ti bhita asurapurameva pavisimsu.
sn11.6:3.5: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sakkassa devanamindassa dhammena jayo ahosi”ti.
